data.meanings: to leave/forsake/neglect, fall upon, wound, cut in slices, let, desist.
data.sentence: The word فَيَذَرُهَا comes from the root و ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: to leave/forsake/neglect, fall upon, wound, cut in slices, let, desist.

data.meanings: to cover, lag behind, walk cautiously, even, soft, depressed, desert, waterless, barren place, desolate.
data.sentence: The word قَاعًا comes from the root ق و ع and is associated with the meanings: to cover, lag behind, walk cautiously, even, soft, depressed, desert, waterless, barren place, desolate.
The word صَفْصَفًا comes from the root ص ف ص ف and is associated with the meanings: gurd, level plain.
